question.title: I want to switch to a different window, using java and selenium, but the second window buffers continuously
question.body:
I am developing an automation script using java and selenium. When I click on a button it opens a new window which buffers continuously and an alert popup is there. Until I accept the alert popup the window buffers, when I click on Ok then window is loaded.Now the thing is using window handles method, selenium is not able to identify the second window as it is not loaded.

I tried adding delay in the code before using get.windowhandles() method, but nothing works. how can I switch to this window?
